remarks: Cancellation law for vector subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvsubadd.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvsubadd.3 $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
nvpncan2 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A G B ) M A ) = B ) $.
